code: import React,{useState}from'react';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Create=()=>{const[property,setProperty]=useState('');const[location,setLocation]=useState('');const[space,setSpace]=useState('');const[img,setImg]=useState('');const handleSubmit=e=>{e.preventDefault();const list={property,location,space,img};fetch('http://localhost:8000/list/',{method:'POST',headers:{"Content-Type":"application/json"},body:JSON.stringify(list)}).then(()=>{console.log('new property added');});};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"create",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Add a new listing"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleSubmit,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{children:"Property Name:"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",required:true,value:property,onChange:e=>setProperty(e.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{children:"Property Location:"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",required:true,value:location,onChange:e=>setLocation(e.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{children:"Property Space:"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",required:true,value:space,onChange:e=>setSpace(e.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{children:"Property Image:"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"link",required:true,value:img,onChange:e=>setImg(e.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{children:"Add Property"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:property}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:location}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:space}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:img,alt:"Upload Image",height:"300",width:"500",className:"img"})]})]});};export default Create;
